TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PngBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class PngBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images.

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 格式位图支持帧级元数据。 format bitmaps support frame level metadata. 它们不支持预览、 全局缩略图、 帧级缩略图、 全局元数据或多个帧。They do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 编码不工作不在部分信任环境中。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)有关部分信任的信息。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化若要对新的位图图像进行编码。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption Interlace { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap should interlace.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap should interlace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交错是指显示的过程[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]两个字段中的帧。Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields. 一个字段包含的帧，偶数行，其他字段包含奇数行的帧。One field contains the even lines of the frame, and the other field contains the odd lines of the frame. 当[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]是查看，首先，显示一个字段中的行，然后显示第二个字段中的行。When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
